moduleName: Gmail / Users / Settings / Send As / Verify
description: Sends a verification email to the specified send-as alias address. The verification status must be `pending`. This method is only available to service account clients that have been delegated domain-wide authority.

schema.description: OAuth 2 access token. Most APIs require `https://mail.google.com/` scope. Google Auth / Service Account Token can be used to obtain a valid access token.
API key can be generated in Google Developer Console in APIs & Services section. Leave blank if OAuth access token is used.
User's email address. The special value "me" can be used to indicate the authenticated user.
The send-as alias to be verified.
